name: Nizthewiz Technology Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a delivery application designed to offer same day logistics and courier services. The company's application provides crowd-sourced courier fleet providing full transparency of the last mile delivery cycle which empowers users with live GPS tracking for all deliveries every step, enabling e-commerce and logistics industry to directly communicate their requirements and manage their own outcomes.
one_liner: Developer of a delivery application designed to offer same day logistics and courier services. The company's application provides crowd-sourced courier fleet providing full transparency of the last mile delivery cycle which empowers users with live GPS tracking for all deliveries every step, enabling e-commerce and logistics industry to directly communicate their requirements and manage their own outcomes.
